description: Structured information describing a version of a brain atlas.

alias.description: User-defined identifier, often a short name, of this brain atlas version.

alternativeVersionOf.description: Link to an alternative brain atlas versions.

annotationSet.description: List of annotations that define this brain atlas version

coordinateSpace.description: Link to coordinate space this brain atlas version is represented in

fullName.description: A descriptive name of this brain atlas.

newVersionOf.description: Link to the previous brain atlas version.

referenceDataset.description: Link to a reference dataset registered in the database.

releaseDate.description: Date of first broadcast/publication/release of this brain atlas version.

terminology.description: Link to the terminology of this brain atlas version.

versionIdentifier.description: Version identifier of this brain atlas version.

versionInnovation.description: Short description of the novelties / peculiarities of this brain atlas version.
